00068   chain::Real Vector3::MagnitudeSquared() const
00069   {
00070     return x*x+y*y+z*z;
00071   }

00073   chain::Real Vector3::Magnitude() const
00074   {
00075     return CH_SQRT(MagnitudeSquared());

00078   const Vector3& Vector3::Normalise()
00079   {
00080     double tmp = x*x + y*y + z*z;
00081     if(tmp>0.0)
00082     {
00083       tmp = 1.0 / sqrt(tmp);
00084       x *= (Real)tmp;
00085       y *= (Real)tmp;
00086       z *= (Real)tmp;
00087     }
00088     return *this;
00089   }
00090 
00091   const Vector3& Vector3::Scale( Real s )
00092   {
00093     double tmp = x*x + y*y + z*z;
00094     if(tmp>0.0)
00095     {
00096       tmp = s / sqrt(tmp);
00097       x *= (Real)tmp;
00098       y *= (Real)tmp;
00099       z *= (Real)tmp;
00100     }
00101     return *this;
00102   }
00103 
00104   const Vector3& Vector3::Truncate( Real s )
00105   {
00106     double tmp = x*x + y*y + z*z;
00107     if(tmp>s*s)
00108     {
00109       tmp = s / sqrt(tmp);
00110       x *= (Real)tmp;
00111       y *= (Real)tmp;
00112       z *= (Real)tmp;
00113     }
00114     return *this;
00115   }

00141   Vector3 Vector3::operator ^ (const Vector3& v) const // CROSS
00142   {
00143     return Vector3 ( y*v.z - z*v.y,
00144                     z*v.x - x*v.z,
00145                     x*v.y - y*v.x );
00146   }

00210   bool Vector3::operator == (const Vector3& v) const
00211   {
00212     return FCOMPARE(x,v.x) && FCOMPARE(y,v.y) && FCOMPARE(z,v.z);
00213   }
00214   bool Vector3::operator != (const Vector3& v) const
00215   {
00216     if( !FCOMPARE(x,v.x) || !FCOMPARE(y,v.y) || !FCOMPARE(z,v.z) )
00217       return true;
00218     return false;
00219   }
